main event: Report of multiple flights in the Sarasota area with unusual lighting configurations observed on 27 April 1964.
interesting points: The report mentions an object related to a 'lighted streamers balloon' and questions about its operation at night., Witness expressed curiosity about why one jet had navigation lights while the other had only one light., The handwritten letter was directed to an Operations Officer at McDill Air Force Base., The report includes a hand-drawn diagram indicating the tracking of observed lights and jets., The sighting occurred between 7:45 and 8:15 PM on the evening of the report.
